article_title: Letter: Kim McCloskey’s article makes some interesting points

article_metadata.description: Kim McCloskey’s article on the Affordable Care Act was interesting. I agree that the media often miss untrue statements. For example, “If you like your health care plan, you’ll be able to keep your health care plan. Period.”Medicaid at $450 billion annually is not free. If the states do not pay directly, then we federal taxpayers will. And a two-year study by Oregon showed health outcomes were not significantly better for people on Medicaid than those without it. If
